titles.title: Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to require that the expenses of special-order speeches be paid from the Members Representational Allowance of the Members making such speeches.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 2/9/1999--Introduced. Amends rule XVII (decorum and debate) of the Rules of the House of Representatives to require that the expenses of any special-order speech be paid from the Members Representational Allowance of the Member making such speech.
